divs: Sighting DetailsI got out of my car, looked back and up in the sky, approximately 25-30 feet from my driveway, there was this hugh object just sitting there (stationary).Since it was dark, I could not determined what the object looked like nor the exact size - all I know is that it was hugh in size.. All I saw was this opague yellow circular light. The object may have been the size of a football field.- I was in awe, saying, oh my God, oh my God. As I stared at this hugh object just sitting there, the object flew straight up, then down, then up again, then disappeared...
Summary: Hugh object in the night sky - a short distance from my driveway. Stationary, circular opague yellow light
